content: NEW YORK  Jan 7 Extenet Systems  which makes small wireless towers to help large telecom carriers improve their service in places like U.S. sports stadiums  is exploring a sale that could fetch more than $700 million  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: SBA Communications Corporation
title: Tower company Extenet Systems explores sale-sources
